name: Egg Ascent (weed_snorkeler)
description:
A level timer is toggleable in the settings menu, this records your level times and keeps track of you personal bests.

How to Play:

  • Hold the left mouse button to suck up an egg.
  • Release the left mouse button to shoot the egg.
  • Shooting an egg in mid air will knock you back, allowing you to make higher jumps.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Mouse to suck and spit eggs
  • Esc/P to pause

Originally made in 7 days for Godot Wild Jam #28.

A momentum based platformer where you use your ability to suck up and spit out different colored eggs to launch yourself through platforming challenges.
